tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (SINV (VP (VBZ is)) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN state)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NN mind)) (, ,) (SBAR (S (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN state)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN heart))))))) (: ...))))))
